question: When is Women’s Equality Day observed every year?
explanation:
Every Year, Women’s Equality Day is observed in the United States of America and other parts of the world on August 26.
This day is observed in memory of the American Women getting the constitution right to vote. It is proclaimed each year by the President of the United States. This year marks the 100th anniversary of the Women's Equality Day since on August 26 1920, right to vote was secured by women in America.
